title: Store Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 days. I interviewed at Habitat For Humanity Restore in Jan 2023
Interview Descriptions: There was a lot of questions. It went good, I was offered a job on the spot. Not the best pay for the amount of work and heavy lifting, however so i did not end up taking the position
Interview Questions: Experience? Explain a time you had to solve a conflict?

title: Assistant Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Habitat For Humanity Restore
Interview Descriptions: the interview was simple, not intimidating. friendly. They were kind, Funny and I felt like I needed to work here for the positive energy. It looks like a fun enjoyable place to work.
Interview Questions:
what are my interests
a few scenario questions.
some were related to the actual job.

title: Retail Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Habitat For Humanity Restore
Interview Descriptions: The interview process consisted of two people who were very professional, and very accurate at measuring my overqualifications.  They asked relevant questions and were eager to hire someone professional and motivated.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Sales Floor Team Member Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Habitat For Humanity Restore (Danbury, CT) in Feb 2016
Interview Descriptions: Brief, kind, and personable. Very conversational. We discussed the benefits of supporting a nonprofit and how it can be a symbol of good in the world. We sat down in the store and went over past experience. I listed my responsibilities at my last job and how it might relate to this one.
Interview Questions:
Would you be comfortable working only 12 hours per week?
Have you had experience in customer service?
